name: fda-tools
description: AI-powered FDA regulatory assistant with 50 commands -- predicate search, substantial equivalence analysis, submission drafting, Pre-Sub eSTAR/PreSTAR XML generation with multi-pathway support (510k, PMA, IDE, De Novo), PMA Intelligence with comparison engine, clinical data extraction, supplement tracking, SSED download and 15-section extraction, unified 510(k)/PMA predicate interface, cross-pathway comparison, automated data updates, section comparison, and regulatory intelligence
